title: Topic 003 Question 039
body: Use the following login credentials as needed:
To enter your username, place your cursor in the Sign in box and click on the username below.
To enter your password, place your cursor in the Enter password box and click on the password below.
If the Azure portal does not load successfully in the browser, press CTRL-K to reload the
portal in a new browser tab.
The following information is for technical support purposes only:
You plan to deploy a firewall to subnet1-2. The firewall will have an IP address of 10.1.2.4.
You need to ensure that traffic from subnet1-1 to the IP address range of 192.168.10.0/24 is
routed through the firewall that will be deployed to subnet 1-2. The solution must be achieved
To complete this task, sign in to the Azure portal.
